brainly_data.question: How was ancient China similar and different to other ancient river civilizations?
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.question: How was ancient China similar and different to other ancient river civilizations?
all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: Ancient River civilization are similar to ancient China because they all had rulers. They were different because of their beliefs and religions.
